Core components of the entrepreneurship program include understanding the new business venture process, recognizing ethical issues within entrepreneurial businesses and communicating effectively to business stakeholders. This rigorous curriculum will prepare you for many different career paths including starting and growing your own business, managing medium-sized enterprises, consulting and new product development. DePaul’s Driehaus College of Business is located in downtown Chicago in the heart of the city’s financial district, providing you with countless opportunities to intern and work professionally with Fortune 500 companies, local startups or any business in between. You are encouraged to complete an internship with a Chicago area business during the summer preceding either your junior or senior year.
